title: Consumer Protection
context: §487-4 Salary and duties of executive director; benefits. The director may define the executive director&rsquo;s powers and duties and fix the executive director&rsquo;s compensation. The executive director and attorney staff members shall be entitled to participate in any employee benefit plan. [L 1969, c 175, §4; am L 1975, c 58, §21; am L 1982, c 129, §18; am L 1986, c 128, §16; am L 1988, c 60, §4]
